title: exp/norm NKFC and NFKD normalization bug
body:
by **awalterschulze**: 
Copy the attached file to exp/norm and run.
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Run The Tests
2.
3.

What is the expected output?
Tests passing

What do you see instead?
Tests failing

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?
6g, I think

Which operating system are you using?
fedora

Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)
tip

Please provide any additional information below.
"Henry \u2163" != "Henry IV" found example @
http://unicode.org/reports/tr15/ Table 8
See comments and additional test 2 supercript 5 that also fails.
Attachments: 1. henry_test.go (3637 bytes)
